        public EditorActionHandler getActionHandler(java.lang.String actionId)
        Description copied from class: EditorActionManager
        Returns the handler currently defined for the specified editor actions.
        Specified by:
        getActionHandler in class EditorActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - the ID of the action for which the handler is requested. Possible IDs are defined in the IdeActions class by constants starting with ACTION_EDITOR_.
        Returns:
        the handler currently defined for the action.

      • setActionHandler

        Sets the handler for the specified editor actions.
        Specified by:
        setActionHandler in class EditorActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionId - the ID of the action for which the handler is set. Possible IDs are defined in the IdeActions class by constants starting with ACTION_EDITOR_.
        Returns:
        the handler previously defined for the action.
